blogs.title: Oil Production
blogs.body: Crude oil includes lease condensate. The sum of individual states may not equal total U.S. volumes due to independent rounding. Volumes are rounded to the nearest whole number; a zero may indicate volume of less than 0.5 thousand barrels per day. Previous months' production volumes may have been revised for all states/areas. Percent change is calculated using unrounded values.

blogs.title: Reservoir Description
blogs.body: for Reservoir description ,fluid characterization,rock characterization are determined, all the data from the previous studies are performed and evaluated in a specialized laboratory, to detemrine fluid composition, saturation, pressure, temparture, specific gravity, density

blogs.title: Displacement of the Fluid
blogs.body:
The displacement of the fluid is possible due to forces(viscous force, gravity force, capillary force.

the forces occurs as a consenquence of the small dimension poros media, the smaller the poros ratios is , the stronger the capillary force is
